description: [Status: stable] [Name: invalid-todo-tag] [Message: Invalid TODO tag: {tag}] What it does Checks that a TODO comment is labelled with "TODO". Why is this bad? Ambiguous tags reduce code visibility and can lead to dangling TODOs. For example, if a comment is tagged with "FIXME" rather than "TODO", it may be overlooked by future readers. Note that this rule will only flag "FIXME" and "XXX" tags as incorrect. Example # FIXME(ruff): this should get fixed! Use instead: # TODO(ruff): this is now fixed!
